alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Union and Columbia Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Belmont to Providence. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, nickel size hail, and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Lake City, White Springs, Ichetucknee Spring, Columbia, Fort White, Worthington Springs, Palestine Community, Groves, Providence and Winfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
